game.name: Mini Mini-Golf
game.shortDescription: Mini Mini-Golf - a minimalistic game about golf in the casual genre.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mini Mini-Golf - a minimalistic game about golf in the casual genre.

reviewHighlights.text: I saw it was on sale, and thought it would be a fun way to pass half an hour. This is not a game, it is barely a minigolf environment. The ball is not...
such a rigged game, doesn't even let you hit the ball where you aim to hit it, waste of my time, do not I REPEAT! DO NOT BUY THIS GAME, WASTE OF MONEY...
